name: Barbarian
description: Savage warriors from truly rural areas.

name: Bard
description: Gifted – or cursed – from birth with sorcery, and they tend to join the military to legitimize their abilities. Due to the suspicion of arcane magic and sorcerers in the Iron Kingdoms, many folk with the gift of sorcery pursue the life of a war-band

name: War Bard
description: Gifted – or cursed – from birth with sorcery, and they tend to join the military to legitimize their abilities. Due to the suspicion of arcane magic and sorcerers in the Iron Kingdoms, many folk with the gift of sorcery pursue the life of a war-band
